head.headtext: Criticism—Consideration for the Contract May Be the Property Right in the Information

para.paratext: It is submitted that the consideration for a contract for confidential business information is often the property right in the information. Thus, in enforcing a party's contractual right to maintain the secrecy of the information, the court is implicitly recognizing a right in the information itself which, it is submitted, is a property right.
